entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.summary: Rain. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
